author: David Gilbert, Michael Learmonth
title: Here's How China Is Rewriting the History of the Coronavirus Pandemic to Make Itself the Hero
description: The Chinese government has waged a months-long disinformation campaign to portray itself as the country the defeated the virus when it attempted to hide it for months.
content:
At midnight on Friday China closed its borders to the rest of the world as it bids to stop a resurgence of the coronavirus.
 The move was the culmination of a months-long PR and disinformation campaign waged by the Chinese government to rewrite the history o… [+7536 chars]
